public class dataStorage extends Object
dataStorage class for storing and getting data from JSON file

    • selectPoi

      public int selectPoi(ArrayList<POI> poilist, String building, int floor, int x, int y)
      selectPoi method returning the index of the target POI in Array list of POIs
      Parameters:
      poilist - an array list of POI objects
      building - the building of the POI
      floor - the floor of the POI
      x - the x coordinate of the POI
      y - the y coordinate of the POI
      Returns:
      int index of the POI

    • searchPoi

      public ArrayList<POI> searchPoi(String keyword)
      searchPoi method, given a keyword, return all the pois that contain the keyword in their name, category, description, floor number, room number and building
      Parameters:
      keyword - String of the searched poi must contain
      Returns:
      POI array list containing all poi object that contains the keyword

    • favoritePoi

      public void favoritePoi(POI poi, String user)
      favoritePoi method update the poi favorite status to JSON file
      Parameters:
      poi - the POI object that is changing favorite type
      user - the user who is changing the favorite type
